defs.docs: A simple, streaming, partially-validating XML writer that writes XML data into an internal buffer.

defs.name: write_attribute_raw
defs.value:
pub fn write_attribute_raw<F>(&mut Self, &str, F) where
F: FnOnce(&mut Vec<u8>) -> ()

attributes.value: / Closure provides a mutable reference to an internal buffer.
/ **Warning:** this method is an escape hatch for cases when you need to write
/ a lot of data very fast.
/ - If set, text nodes will be written as is.
/ - If not set, text nodes will be indented.
/ Can be set at any moment.

defs.name: end_document
defs.docs: Closes all open elements and returns an internal XML buffer.

attributes.value: / Closes all open elements and returns an internal XML buffer.
